name: AaveV2AssetInteractiveAdapter
description: Interactive adapter for Aave protocol (V2). Implementation of InteractiveAdapter abstract contract.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposits tokens to the Aave protocol (V2). Implementation of InteractiveAdapter function.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array with one element - TokenAmount struct with underlying token address, underlying token amount to be deposited, and amount type.

functionDecorators.name: getBalance
functionDecorators.description: Implementation of ProtocolAdapter abstract contract function.

returnDecorators.description: Amount of tokens held by the given account.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws tokens from the Aave protocol (V2). Implementation of InteractiveAdapter function.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array with one element - TokenAmount struct with aToken address, aToken amount to be redeemed, and amount type.

returnDecorators.name: tokensToBeWithdrawn
returnDecorators.description: Array with one element - underlying token.
